idea-plugin.name: MakeMeCoffee
idea-plugin.description: Remember all those times when you would say: "Good IDE, the only thing missing is a 'Make Coffee' button."? Well, today is a brew-tiful day for coffee addicts! At JetBrains, we give a Frappe about our customer's Irishs, with this very little (20Kb) plugin you can finally brew that Caramel-Skinny-Vanilla-de-caff-Macchiato right from the IDE's toolbar
